entry.title: Partial Downtime During Scheduled Maintenance
entry.content:
Jul 23, 13:34 UTC
Resolved - During a scheduled database upgrade, we experienced some unexpected partial downtime in Astra between 1:16 PM and 1:34 PM UTC. During this window, some data may have been slow to load or temporarily unavailable.

The issue has since been resolved, and systems are operating normally. We appreciate your patience and apologize for any inconvenience caused.

entry.title: Scheduled maintenance to Astra database
entry.content:
Jun 24, 14:37 UTC
Completed - The scheduled maintenance has been completed.

Jun 24, 00:48 UTC
Scheduled - We will be performing scheduled maintenance, which may cause temporary disruptions to data syncing, data loading, updates, and automations.

This maintenance affects Astra only — Classic will not be impacted.

entry.title: Stacker Classic Down
entry.content:
Jun 6, 16:18 UTC
Resolved - This incident has been resolved.

Jun 6, 16:14 UTC
Update - This issue has been resolved. Thanks for your patience.

Jun 6, 16:10 UTC
Investigating - We're investigating an issue which is affecting all customers on Stacker Classic not using custom domains.

entry.title: Unscheduled database maintenance for Astra
entry.content:
May 30, 18:04 UTC
Completed - The scheduled maintenance has been completed.

May 30, 17:59 UTC
In progress - Scheduled maintenance is in progress

May 30, 17:45 UTC
Scheduled - As part of preventing an upcoming incident we're having to restart the database cluster which serves our Astra product. The whole of Astra will be unavailable fr 2-3 minutes while we make this change. I apologies for the short notice for this maintenance.

Customers using the Classic product are unaffected.

entry.title: Scheduled maintenance
entry.content:
May 26, 16:17 UTC
Completed - The scheduled maintenance has been completed.

May 26, 16:07 UTC
Update - Scheduled maintenance on Astra is complete. Thank you.

May 22, 17:13 UTC
Update - We will be undergoing scheduled maintenance during this time.

May 22, 17:12 UTC
Scheduled - Astra Only (Stacker Classic unaffected)

We have a scheduled infrastructure update on Monday, May 26 at 9:00 AM PST. We expect only brief and partial downtime, lasting no more than a minute or two. In most cases, any disruption—such as to Stacker data loading—is barely noticeable. However, there is a chance some automation events will be missed during this short window.

entry.title: Stacker Classic Outage
entry.content:
Apr 7, 12:05 UTC
Resolved - This incident has now been resolved and everything is working as expected.

Apr 7, 10:44 UTC
Monitoring - We have fixed the issue and we are investigating the underlying causes. We're monitoring the system while everything returns to normal.

Apr 7, 09:52 UTC
Investigating - We are currently urgently investigating an issue impacting Stacker Classic. This is causing Stacker apps to load slowly or to show loading spinners for long periods of time.

Our engineers are engaged to resolve this issue as quickly as possible. We'll update here when we have an ETA for resolution.

entry.title: Stacker stuck on the loading screen
entry.content:
Feb 25, 19:15 UTC
Resolved - This has been resolved, you should now be able to access your apps. Please let us know if you have any questions or remaining issues.

Feb 25, 19:03 UTC
Investigating - This is impacting only Astra users. When opening Stacker it is stuck on the loading page, we are working on finding a fix for the issue. Thank you for your patience while we work through the issue.

entry.title: Some users unable to login to Stacker (12:20UTC-13:40UTC)
entry.content:
Nov 22, 12:00 UTC
Resolved - We experienced an issue that impacted some users' ability to log into Stacker between 12:20 UTC and 13:40 UTC. The issue has since been resolved.

If you're still encountering any problems, please try refreshing your page. If the issue persists, feel free to reach out to us at support@stackerhq.com, and we'll be happy to assist you.

We apologize for any inconvenience this may have caused and are actively investigating the cause to prevent this from happening in the future. If you have any questions or concerns, please don’t hesitate to contact our support team.

Thank you for your understanding.

entry.title: Scheduled Database Update
entry.content:
Nov 12, 08:30 UTC
Completed - The scheduled maintenance has been completed.

Nov 12, 08:00 UTC
In progress - Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.

Nov 11, 10:47 UTC
Scheduled - We will be undergoing a scheduled database update which will involve Stacker being unavailable for about 10 minutes.

entry.title: Scheduled Database Update
entry.content:
Nov 11, 08:10 UTC
Completed - The scheduled maintenance has been completed.

Nov 11, 08:00 UTC
In progress - Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.

Nov 8, 15:03 UTC
Scheduled - We will be undergoing a scheduled database update which will involve Stacker being unavailable for about 10 minutes.

entry.title: Short unplanned outages due to database maintenance
entry.content:
Sep 9, 13:30 UTC
Resolved - Stacker V5 "Astra" had three short outage periods where all requests to the service failed on Monday between 12:30 and 14:00 UTC. Each of the three outage periods lasted 1-2 minutes. This was a result of some routine database changes causing an unforseen conflict which prevented normal queries from being processed. Because it was part of changes we were making manually we were able to identify and resolve the issue almost immediately.

We apologies for the disrption this would have caused to any users online at the time. We're reviewing our processes which should have protected aginst thins kind of conflict.

entry.title: File uploads are not working
entry.content:
Aug 6, 13:47 UTC
Resolved - This incident has been resolved.

Aug 6, 13:07 UTC
Monitoring - The issue seems to be resolved and uploads are now working. We will continue to monitor for any further issues. If you still have issues after a page refresh please reach out to support and we'll be able to help you out.

Aug 6, 09:08 UTC
Investigating - Our file upload service is not working correctly. This prevents any files being uploaded into Stacker: in attachment fields, rich text fields, app or workspace logos, and so on. We're continuing to investigate the issue.

This is affecting both our Classic (V4) and Astra (V5) versions.

entry.title: Admins are unable to preview as a user
entry.content:
Jul 30, 18:48 UTC
Resolved - We have released a fix for this issue! Please contact support@stackerhq.com if you have questions or continue to experience difficulties.

Jul 30, 18:33 UTC
Identified - We have identified the issue and are working on a fix.

Jul 30, 18:30 UTC
Investigating - We are currently investigating an issue where admins are unable to preview as a user in their apps.

entry.title: File uploads not available
entry.content:
Dec 21, 06:00 UTC
Resolved - Attachment fields in Stacker weren't able to add new files.

This was caused by an issue with our file storage provider which we have now resolved.

entry.title: Airtable tables not appearing in some apps
entry.content:
Nov 18, 17:31 UTC
Resolved - We have emailed all customers who need to take action to re-authorize their Airtable connections.

Nov 18, 17:31 UTC
Monitoring - We have resolved the issues with the Stacker apps, however you may need to repair your authorization with Airtable in order to continue to sync data.

Please go to the data connection settings in each application and click "Repair".

During the re-authorization process, you need to authorize every Base used in Stacker, across all of your Stacker apps. The simplest way to do this is to select the option labelled "All current and future bases in all current and future workspaces”.

Nov 18, 14:31 UTC
Identified - We've identified the issue, and have taken Stacker offline in order to safely apply the necessary fix. We're working hard to get it back online as soon as possible.

Nov 18, 11:57 UTC
Investigating - We are investigating reports that tables from Airtable are not appearing in some users' apps

entry.title: Schema sync from Airtable is not syncing or is slow
entry.content:
Nov 14, 17:39 UTC
Resolved - This incident has now been resolved! Thank you.

Nov 14, 16:25 UTC
Identified - We have identified the issue. The following features are experiencing issues: our data source schema syncs (Airtable, Gsheets, Postgres, Salesforce) and Stacker realtime data.
Workaround: If you run a schema sync then close the schema sync pop up and refresh your app you should see your changes.

Nov 14, 16:02 UTC
Investigating - We are currently investigation an issue where Airtable schema sync is not working or is slow. We will keep you updated as we continue to look into this.

entry.title: Stacker navigation is hidden from app view
entry.content:
Nov 10, 17:35 UTC
Resolved - The incident of the navigation being hidden has now been resolved.

Nov 10, 17:18 UTC
Monitoring - A fix has been implemented and we are currently monitoring the fix.

Nov 10, 15:30 UTC
Identified - The issue has been identified and we are implementing a fix for the navigation being hidden.

Nov 10, 15:24 UTC
Investigating - We are currently investigating an issue where the navigation and tables appear to be hidden from the app view. We will update when we have more information. Thank you!

entry.title: Apps are taking longer than normal to load
entry.content:
Aug 29, 18:12 UTC
Resolved - The incident with slow loading times has now been resolved.

Aug 29, 17:50 UTC
Monitoring - A fix for the long load times in Stacker apps has been deployed and we are continuing to monitor.

Aug 29, 17:27 UTC
Investigating - We are currently investigating an issue with apps taking longer than normal to load.

entry.title: Schema Sync Intermittently Fails for Password-Protected Airtable Bases
entry.content:
Aug 29, 09:03 UTC
Resolved - Schema sync should now work consistently for password-protected sharing links. There was an unexpected change in the schema sync responses we were getting from Airtable, and we needed some time to adapt.

Thanks for your patience while we sorted this out.

Aug 28, 20:00 UTC
Investigating - We're aware of an ongoing issue affecting schema syncing for Airtable bases with passwords. We'll be looking into this matter and will provide further updates as soon as possible. We apologize for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience.

entry.title: Attachments no longer working
entry.content:
Aug 16, 14:02 UTC
Resolved - This incident has been resolved.

Aug 16, 14:00 UTC
Update - We are continuing to investigate this issue.

Aug 16, 13:59 UTC
Investigating - We are currently investigating this issue.

entry.title: Errors when schema syncing an Airtable base
entry.content:
Aug 15, 20:46 UTC
Resolved - This incident has now been resolved.

Aug 15, 20:38 UTC
Identified - The issue has been identified and we are implementing a fix.

Aug 15, 19:48 UTC
Investigating - We are currently investigating an issue with schema syncing Airtable bases that have passwords or are using old sharing link types.

entry.title: New Airtable connections are not syncing
entry.content:
Aug 15, 02:26 UTC
Resolved - No other issues being seen or reported. Will continue to work with Airtable to resolve issue with password protected bases.

Aug 14, 21:43 UTC
Monitoring - A fix has been implemented and we are monitoring the results. We are still seeing issues with Password-protected bases not schema syncing.

Aug 14, 20:48 UTC
Investigating - We are currently investigating an issue where adding a new Airtable connection is not syncing for some users.

entry.title: Blank screen when loading the app
entry.content:
Aug 7, 10:27 UTC
Resolved - Issue is resolved. We'll be implementing additional monitoring and working on making sure this particular issue doesn't happen again.

Thanks for your patience.

Aug 7, 10:21 UTC
Investigating - We are looking into an issue where some customers are seeing a blank screen when loading the app.

entry.title: Load balancer issues
entry.content:
Aug 2, 17:56 UTC
Resolved - This incident has now been resolved!

Aug 2, 17:27 UTC
Monitoring - A fix has been implemented and we are continuing to monitor the incident.

Aug 2, 14:28 UTC
Update - Everything in Stacker is currently operational with slightly degraded performance.

However, the root cause is currently being investigated by one of our providers as it may be stemming from them. We are working with them to find a solution. Further outages may be possible as we continue working on the issue, but we will do our best to keep them at a minimum.

Aug 2, 11:32 UTC
Update - We believe Stacker should now be working for most people, but we're continuing to investigate the situation.

Aug 2, 10:51 UTC
Investigating - It seems like an issue with our load balancer has brought Stacker down. You will most likely not be able to load your apps at the moment.

We're looking into it with priority, and we'll let you know as soon as we have more information.

entry.title: Planned Maintenance
entry.content:
Jun 22, 06:30 UTC
Completed - The scheduled maintenance has been completed.

Jun 22, 06:00 UTC
In progress - Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.

Jun 15, 12:49 UTC
Scheduled - We will be performing maintenance on June 22 at 6 AM UTC.

The maintenance includes a security update, and requires a tiny bit of downtime. We expect the maintenance to last up to 30 minutes, with up to 2 minutes of downtime around 6 AM UTC.
